scripts.postinstall: (cd api && echo 'Installing API node modules' && npm i); (cd jigsaw && echo 'Installing jigsaw node modules' && npm i);
scripts.debug: export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect ./node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline -s dev --noAuth --config serverless-api.yml
scripts.debug-test: export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect ./node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline -s test --port 3010 --noAuth --config serverless-api.yml
scripts.start-test: sls offline start -s test --port 3010 --noAuth --config serverless-api.yml & node ./api/test/FakeJigsawAndW2.js & node ./api/test/FakePlatformApis.js
